data.actual_result: Channel topic is not scrollable. You can only scroll there when you have permission to edit it.
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll through the whole channel topic there.
data.short_description: Channel topic in channel settings not scrollable when you don't have permission to edit it
data.steps_to_repro: - Find or create a channel with very long channel topic (e.g. #bug-hunter-general) - Click on the channel name and go to channel settings - Observe the long channel topic
